message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair deal considering its worth to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I cannot exceed $10,000. I believe $9,750 is a reasonable price given the value it holds for me.
